name: Aegis of Abyssal Flame
description:
Provide 3 Shield points to the character to which this card is attached.
Before Shield points are depleted: The character to which this is attached deals +1 Pyro DMG.
descriptionraw: Provide <color=#FFFFFFFF>3 $[K6] points</color> to the character to which this card is attached.\nBefore $[K6] points are depleted: The character to which this is attached deals +1 $[K103].
